metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2435 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The NVIDIA video driver in Android before 2016-05-01 on Nexus 9 devicesallows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internalbug 27297988.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
